attributes.action: save the tumbledown dick pub and live music venue
attributes.additional_details:
save the Tumbledown Dick pub in Farnborough. Since its closure in 2008 the c...urrent owners have allowed the pub to fall into a terrible state of disrepair. This is a historical building dating back to the 17th Century on a main road through the town. Why is it not being saved? All help welcomed.
please sihn and spread the word

rejection.details:
To have a building considered for listing you have to submit an application to English Heritage. The application form that you will need to fill out, and further information about the listing process, can be found at the following link: http://www.english-heritage.org.uk/professional/protection/process/online-application-form/

If you do not have access to the internet you will need to contact English Heritage for a paper version. The English Heritage customer service team can be contacted on 0870 333 1181.
